an9.65:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
an9.65:4.3: Sights cognizable by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
an9.65:4.6: Touches cognizable by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
an9.65:4.7: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
an9.65:5.1: To give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation you should develop the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. …”
